location_short_descr: A place we always eat and drink when we are in Nuremberg is Barfüßer...
location_long_descr: A place we always eat and drink when we are in Nuremberg is Barfüßer. The first time we walked into Barfüßer im Mautkeller was a coincidence. From the outside, the home brewery is not immediately noticeable in the dark winter months. That's because you have to walk down a flight of stairs to end up in a huge cellar where the beer flows freely. No less than six hundred guests can go here and believe it or not…
